about_the_game:
"Last Christmas" is a chilling point-and-click adventure game set in a remote mountain cabin. You play as Frankie, who's determined to make this Christmas perfect for his beloved girlfriend, Betty. But as you delve deeper into the cabin's secrets, you'll discover that something sinister is lurking in the shadows. Every decision you make could lead to dire consequences, and the line between reality and nightmare begins to blur. Will you be able to uncover the dark truth behind the cabin's past and survive the horrors that await you? Play "Last Christmas" to find out, if you dare...

Key Features:

  • Accessible Game: Short game can be completed in 30-60 minutes.

  • Multiple Endings: Experience 4 unique conclusions based on your choices.

  • Dark Humour: A twisted blend of wit and horror to keep you on edge.

  • Stunning Visuals: Hand-drawn, detailed backgrounds bring the story to life.

  • Quick Navigation: Instantly exit scenes with a double-click.

  • Helpful Tools: A hotspot finder ensures you won’t miss a thing.

  • Replayability: Discover all 24 achievements and uncover hidden details.

Are you ready to face the truth? Play "Last Christmas" and step into a holiday tale you’ll never forget...

content_descriptors.notes:
- It is recommended that people with heart conditions seek medical advice before playing this game.  There are moments that will trigger the body's "fight or flight" response, which can increase your heart rate and blood pressure.  

- Last Christmas contains scenes that imply murder / self-inflicted death that some people may find distressing.
